fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

bangers.name: bangers
bangers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

knock_out.name: knock_out
knock_out.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

sky_rockets.name: sky_rockets
sky_rockets.description: Uses a solid-fuel rocket to rise quickly into the sky.

flashy_sparklers.name: Fflashy_sparklers
flashy_sparklers.description: Burns slowly while emitting colored flames and sparks

roman_candles.name: roman_candles
roman_candles.description: Ejects one or more stars or exploding shells.

cake.name: cake
cake.description: Comprising a series of Roman candles, small aerial shells

black_snake.name: black_snake
black_snake.description: After being lit, they begin to smoke and spew out ash resembling a snake

catherine_wheel.name: catherine_wheel
catherine_wheel.description: When ignited, the energy of the fireworks not only create sparks and flame, but cause the wheel to quickly rotate.

Barrel_bomb.name: Barrel_bomb
Barrel_bomb.description: Typically made from a large barrel-shaped metal container that has been filled with high explosives

Bouncing_bomb.name: Bouncing_bomb
Bouncing_bomb.description: A bouncing bomb is a bomb designed to bounce to a target across water.

Bunker_buster.name: Bunker_buster
Bunker_buster.description: A bunker buster is a type of munition that is designed to penetrate hardened target.

Nail_bomb.name: Nail_bomb
Nail_bomb.description: The nail bomb is an anti-personnel explosive device packed with nails.

Land_mine.name: Land_mine
Land_mine.description: A land mine is an explosive device concealed under or on the ground.

Smoke_bomb.name: Smoke_bomb
Smoke_bomb.description: A smoke bomb is a firework designed to produce smoke upon ignition.

Suitcase_bomb.name: bang_snaps
Suitcase_bomb.description: A hypothetical tactical nuclear weapon that is portable enough that it could use a suitcase as its delivery method.

Stink_bomb.name: Stink_bomb
Stink_bomb.description: Stink bombs range in effectiveness from simple pranks to military grade or riot control chemical agents.

TNT.name: TNT
TNT.description: is a chemical compound with the formula C6H2(NO2)3CH3s.
